meanings.sent1: Her foretelling of the upcoming storm saved many lives.
meanings.sent2: The ancient book contained a foretelling of a great hero who would save the kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's foretelling of finding a hidden acorn was met with laughter by the other animals.
meanings.sent4: The old sailor's foretelling of a calm sea turned out to be true.
meanings.sent5: The fortune teller's foretelling of a long journey ahead left the traveler feeling uneasy.

meanings.sent1: The foretelling of a new leader brought hope to the people.
meanings.sent2: His foretelling of a stock market crash turned out to be accurate.
meanings.sent3: The foretelling of a cat winning the race seemed unlikely but came true.
meanings.sent4: The foretelling of a bright future for the company boosted morale among employees.
meanings.sent5: The foretelling of a surprise party made her birthday even more special.
